subject: Law
title: Title IX and Sex Discrimination
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Title IX and Sex Discrimination.

hook.text: Before 1972, universities could legally reject women from programs. Title IX changed that in one sentence.

buildup.text: Title IX bans sex-based discrimination in any education program receiving federal funding.

discovery.text: It transformed women's sports: female athletic participation in high school rose from 300,000 to over 3 million.

twist.text: Title IX also covers sexual harassment and assault on campus. Schools must investigate complaints or lose funding.

climax.text: Recent debates focus on transgender athletes and whether Title IX's definition of 'sex' includes gender identity.

punchline.text: One sentence opened the door. Decades of interpretation decide how wide.

quiz.question: What does Title IX prohibit?
options: Sex-based discrimination in federally funded education
